p: Personally appeared before me John L. McClaren onbehalf of the petitioners herein, having first been duly sworn on oath deposes and says, that he knows the petitioners herein has read the foregoing petition, and believes the same to be true.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 22nd day of Nov A.D. 1888.
Jas camie Cor Leeves Notary Public in and for Washington Territory W.E. Ledgewood Clerk Dist Court
